name: cssfonts
description: CSS Fonts provides typographical normalization and control
author: msweeney

examples.name: cssfonts-basic
examples.description: When CSS Fonts is included in a page, it applies a baseline font treatment to all HTML elements. This baseline is Arial at the equivalent of 13px size and 16px line-height.

examples.name: cssfonts-context
examples.description: Use the alternate contextual version of YUI Fonts to have precise control over which regions of the page are targeted.

examples.name: cssfonts-size
examples.description: Define all non-baseline sizes in percentages when using YUI Fonts.
